channel.title: portfolio on Roy Jara
channel.description: Recent content in portfolio on Roy Jara

item.title: Augmented Flute
item.description: Why play a regular flute when you can augment it using computers? An exploration for UCLA Theater C212: Emerging Technologies for Live Performance We all know and treasure the flute: the physics of resonating sound waves inside of the chamber, how daunting all the keys look to the inexperienced player, and how it is still used in modern music.

item.title: comun.radio
item.description: Some context comun.radio was created as a response to the lack of distribution opportunities for the forward thinking musicians and sound artists in Peru.

item.title: Phases
item.description: ML in the arts final project @ UCSD (circa March 2019) How do you make art with machine learning? To answer that we would need to rewind a little and first answer the age old question:
